net.canarymod.user

Class UserAndGroupsProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.canarymod.user.UserAndGroupsProvider

  • public class UserAndGroupsProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Access to the backbone for users and groups
    Author:
    Chris Ksoll (damagefilter), Jason Jones (darkdiplomat)
